mapper.select: select deal.dealAmount, deal.dealYear, deal.dealMonth, deal.dealDay, deal.area, deal.floor, deal.aptCode, info.buildYear, info.roadName as address, info.roadNameBonBun, info.roadNameBuBun, dong.dongName, info.apartmentName, info.lng, info.lat from houseinfo as info, housedeal as deal, dongcode as dong where info.aptCode=deal.aptCode and info.dongCode=dong.dongCode and info.dongCode=#{regcode} and deal.dealYear=#{year} and deal.dealMonth=#{month};

select deal.dealAmount, deal.dealYear, deal.dealMonth, deal.dealDay, deal.area, deal.floor, deal.aptCode, info.buildYear, info.roadName, info.roadNameBonBun, info.roadNameBuBun, dong.dongName, info.apartmentName, info.lng, info.lat from houseinfo as info, housedeal as deal, dongcode as dong where info.aptCode=deal.aptCode and info.dongCode=dong.dongCode and info.dongCode=#{regcode};
select aptCode, apartmentName, dongCode, lng, lat from houseinfo where lat between #{lat1} and #{lat2} and lng between #{lng1} and #{lng2}

select b.dongName as addrName, b.dongCode as addrCode, avg(a.lat) as lat, avg(a.lng) as lng, count(a.apartmentName) as cnt, avg(c.dealAmount) as avg from houseinfo a, (select hi.dongCode as dongCode, addr.dongName as dongName from houseinfo hi, dongcode addr where hi.dongCode = addr.dongCode and hi.lat >= #{lat1} and hi.lat <= #{lat2} and hi.lng >= #{lng1} and hi.lng <= #{lng2} group by hi.dongCode order by null) b, housedeal c where a.dongCode = b.dongCode and a.aptCode = c.aptCode group by a.dongCode order by null

select b.gugunName as addrName, b.gugunCode as addrCode, avg(a.lat) as lat, avg(a.lng) as lng, count(a.apartmentName) as cnt, avg(c.dealAmount) as avg from houseinfo a, (select hi.sigunguCode as gugunCode, addr.gugunName as gugunName from houseinfo hi, dongcode addr where addr.dongCode = concat(hi.sigunguCode, '00000') and hi.lat >= #{lat1} and hi.lat <= #{lat2} and hi.lng >= #{lng1} and hi.lng <= #{lng2} group by hi.sigunguCode order by null) b, housedeal c where a.lat between #{lat1} and #{lat2} and a.lng between #{lng1} and #{lng2} and a.sigunguCode = b.gugunCode and a.aptCode = c.aptCode group by b.gugunCode order by null

select b.sidoName as addrname, b.sidoCode as addrCode, avg(a.lat) as lat, avg(a.lng) as lng, count(a.apartmentName) as cnt, avg(c.dealAmount) as avg from houseinfo a, ( select addr.sidoName as sidoName, substr(addr.dongCode, 1, 2) as sidoCode from houseinfo hi, dongcode addr where addr.dongCode = concat(substr(hi.sigunguCode, 1, 2), '00000000') and hi.lat >= #{lat1} and hi.lat <= #{lat2} and hi.lng >= #{lng1} and hi.lng <= #{lng2} group by addr.dongCode order by null) b, housedeal c where a.dongCode like concat(b.sidoCode, '%') and a.aptCode = c.aptCode group by b.sidoCode order by null
select aptCode, buildYear, roadName, roadNameBonbun, roadNameBubun, apartmentName, lng, lat from houseinfo where dongCode like concat(#{addrCode}, '_____')
select aptCode, buildYear, roadName, roadNameBonbun, roadNameBubun, apartmentName, lng, lat from houseinfo where dongCode like concat(#{addrCode}, '________')
select avg(hd.dealAmount) from houseinfo hi, housedeal hd where substring(hi.dongCode, 1, 2) = #{addrCode} and hi.aptCode = hd.aptCode
